relatorioCompleto.title: Complete Report
relatorioCompleto.subtitle: Create a detailed visit report
relatorioCompleto.apenasLojasAtribuidas: Only stores assigned to you are shown.
relatorioCompleto.episDesc: Check: Cut Gloves, Nitrile Gloves, Safety Glasses, Safety Shoes. Mention employees who are not compliant.
relatorioCompleto.consumiveisDesc: Check: Primers and Activators, Headlight polishing product, Acrylic/Plexiglass, Adhesive film, Brushes.
relatorioCompleto.espacoFisicoDesc: Check: WC, Customer restricted area, Lockers, Eating area, Waste, Counter and Desk, Single Cut, Easy Cut, Vacuum, LilBuddy, Compressor, Toolbox.
relatorioCompleto.reclamacoesDesc: Check for complaints and their status.
relatorioCompleto.vendasDesc: Sales analysis: Brushes, Polishes, Rust Treatments, Hood Gluing.
relatorioCompleto.fichasDesc: Validate: Correct CL completion, Use of protective covers, Notes clarifying status, Use of SMS sending.
relatorioCompleto.documentacaoDesc: Check posting: ASAE, Schedule, Holidays, Useful Contacts, Insurance, Brush Prices, Labor Price.
relatorioCompleto.reuniaoDesc: What topics were covered in the meeting?
relatorioCompleto.reuniaoPlaceholder: Describe topics discussed, decisions made, etc...
relatorioCompleto.colaboradoresDesc: Name of employees present during supervision.
relatorioCompleto.colaboradoresPlaceholder: E.g.: John Smith, Mary Jones, Peter Brown...
relatorioCompleto.pontosPositivosDesc: Describe positive points observed during the visit (e.g.: good organization, motivated team, clean store, etc.)
relatorioCompleto.pontosNegativosDesc: Describe negative points observed during the visit (e.g.: stock shortage, organization problems, etc.)
relatorioCompleto.indicarEstadoPendentes: Please indicate the status of all pending items before proceeding
relatorioCompleto.instrucoes: Write instructions appropriate to the supervision performed.
